title: Meta is one of today's worst S&P 500 performers, but these 5 other stocks have lost $387 billion in value; Investors ran for cover after the release of August inflation figures
text:
Read: U.S. inflation roars back in August, CPI shows, despite falling gas prices

Meta Platforms Inc. META was the worst performer among the plethora of big-tech names whose stocks were hit hard, with a 7.7% decline, followed by Nvidia Corp. NVDA, which was down 7.4%, and Advanced Micro Devices Inc. AMD, which dropped 7.3%.
